props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the item.

props.name: textValue
props.description:
Optional text used for typeahead purposes.

By default the typeahead behavior will use the `.textContent` of the `ASelectItemText` part.

Use this when the content is complex, or you have non-textual content inside.

props.name: value
props.description: The value given as data when submitted with a `name`.

events.name: select
events.description:
Event handler called when the selecting item.
It can be prevented by calling `event.preventDefault`.
